articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: Bitcoin dips below $85,000 briefly in crypto rout - AP News
articles.description: Bitcoin and companies tied to cryptocurrencies extended a nearly two-month swoon Monday, tracking with a broader market sell-off in technology companies that many see as overvalued. Bitcoin slid 6.5% after being down nearly 12% earlier in the day, settling in…
articles.content:
Bitcoin and companies tied to cryptocurrencies extended a nearly two-month swoon Monday, tracking with a broader market sell-off in technology companies that many see as overvalued.
